Covers exactly what you need to know to score higher on your NCLEX-RN exam.

Written by Three Leading Nursing Experts!
Wilda Rinehart has a B.S. and M.S. degree in nursing and more than 30 years of experience as a nurse, consultant, and educator for nursing students.
 
Diann Sloan has a B.S. and M.S. degree in nursing and a Ph,D. in counselor education and has worked as a nurse and educator for nearly 30 years.
 
Clara Hurd has a B.S. and M.S. degree in nursing and currently is a nurse educator at Northeast Mississippi Community College with 30 years experience.
 
Score Higher on the NCLEX-RN!
The CD features innovative Computer Adaptive Testing software by ExamForce, giving you an effective tool to assess your readiness for the NCLEX-RN exam. Key features include:
All 1,250 questions in this book are included on the CD, giving you yet another effective tool to assess your readiness for the NCLEX-RN exam
Multiple test modes, questions that simulate an actual RN exam, and detailed answer explanations
A free electronic copy of the book
